articles.title: (PR) Turtle Beach Announces the Stealth Ultra Wireless Gaming Controller with Hall Effect Thumbsticks
articles.description: Best-selling gaming headset and accessory maker Turtle Beach Corporation (Nasdaq: HEAR), today unveiled its eagerly anticipated first-wireless controller for Xbox and PC, the Designed for Xbox Turtle Beach Stealth Ultra Wireless Smart Game Controller. Turtle …
